mission_data.mission_description: A TSN Cruiser has 48 minutes to vanquish as many enemies as possible.^^For a full crew of 6 in Artemis 2.7.1.^^Your Comms Officer should take notes or print out the Communications Cheat Sheet in the mission folder.

set_ship_text.name: Delta Queen
set_ship_text.hailtext: We have a load of undefined. Where should we deliver it?.

set_ship_text.name: Alpha Betty
set_ship_text.hailtext: We have a load of undefined. Where should we deliver it?.

big_message.title: FINAL SCORE |tonnage| kilotons
big_message.subtitle2: is in the mission log file.

big_message.title: YOUR SHIP WAS DESTROYED
big_message.subtitle1: You scored |tonnage| kt of enemy ships.
big_message.subtitle2: Your battle record is in the log file.

event.name: Score Message
event.incoming_comms_text: Current score = |Tonnage| kilotons with |Minutes| minutes remaining

event.name: Execute Mayday
event.incoming_comms_text: MAYDAY sent. Penalty -100 kilotons. Rescue package deployed.

event.name: DS1 Hint
event.incoming_comms_text: Bonus available! If you collect all Vigoranium Nodules a bonus enemy fleet will attack. You can score extra tonnage by destroying it.

event.name: Instructions from DS1
event.incoming_comms_text: Our base can produces Xiridium. We need Platinum to make Nukes. If you send us Salistra or Augite we can make EMP torpedoes.

event.name: DS2 Hint
event.incoming_comms_text: Bonus available! If you collect all High Density Power Cells Nodules a bonus enemy fleet will attack. You can score extra tonnage by destroying it.

event.name: Instructions from DS2
event.incoming_comms_text: Our base can produces Salistra. We need Xiridium to make Nukes. If you send us Platinum or Augite we can make EMP torpedoes.

event.name: DS3 Hint
event.incoming_comms_text: Bonus available! If you collect all Carapaction Coils Nodules a bonus enemy fleet will attack. You can score extra tonnage by destroying it.

event.name: Instructions from DS3
event.incoming_comms_text: Our base can produces Augite. We need Salistra to make Nukes. If you send us Xiridium or Platinum we can make EMP torpedoes.

event.name: DS4 Hint
event.incoming_comms_text: Bonus available! If you collect all Tauron Focusers Nodules a bonus enemy fleet will attack. You can score extra tonnage by destroying it.

event.name: Instructions from DS4
event.incoming_comms_text: Our base can produces Platinum. We need Augite to make Nukes. If you send us Xiridium or Salistra we can make EMP torpedoes.

event.name: Instructions from Scorekeeper
event.incoming_comms_text: DS1 makes Xiridium and prefers Platinum
DS2 makes Salistra and prefers Xiridium
DS3 makes Augite and prefers Salistra
DS4 makes Platinum and prefers Augite
Any base will accept any cargo it doesn't produce.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_7
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Secret Code Cases. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_6
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Carapaction Coils. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_5
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Infusion P-Coils. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_4
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Tauron Focusers. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_3
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Lateral Arrays. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_2
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Cetrocite Crystals. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_1
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the Cetrocite Crystals. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Spawn Bonus Bonus_0
event.incoming_comms_text: Congratulations, Artemis. You collected all of the High Density Power Cells. We are sending a bonus fleet for you to fight.

event.name: Release Delta Queen
event.incoming_comms_text: Bonus available! At the end of every period you will be awarded bonus kilotons for every surviving whale! To win this bonus PROTECT THE WHALES!

event.name: Delta Queen Salistra DS1
event.incoming_comms_text: Delta Queen has delivered a load of Salistra. We are producing an EMP and a Nuke for you. We are loading Delta Queen with Xiridium.

set_ship_text.name: Delta Queen
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are carrying a load of Platinum. Where should we deliver it?.

event.name: Phoenix Broke

set_ship_text.name: Phoenix
set_ship_text.hailtext: Engine malfunction! We can't move until you bring us Damage Control Teams.

event.incoming_comms_text: Our propulsion and steering are broken, Artemis. To rescue us you must rendezvous with us and send over a full set of Damage Control teams.

event.name: Phoenix Fixed
event.incoming_comms_text: Thanks, for repairing our ship Artemis. We are ready for your orders. You should dock at a base to get new Damage Control Teams.

set_ship_text.name: Phoenix
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are ready to obey your orders, Artemis!

warning_popup_message.message: All Damage Control Teams transferred to Phoenix.

event.name: Moscow Broke

set_ship_text.name: Moscow
set_ship_text.hailtext: Engine malfunction! We can't move until you bring us Damage Control Teams.

event.incoming_comms_text: We've had a massive systems failure, Artemis. To rescue us you must rendezvous with us and send over a full set of Damage Control teams.

event.name: Moscow Fixed
event.incoming_comms_text: Thanks, for repairing our ship Artemis. We are ready for your orders. You should dock at a base to get new Damage Control Teams.

set_ship_text.name: Moscow
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are ready to obey your orders, Artemis!

warning_popup_message.message: All Damage Control Teams transferred to Moscow.
